abstract.t: This memo describes version 3 of the Resource Catalog. The ResourceCatalog (RC) is a service for storing and obtaining metadata thatdescribes network-accessible resources. This service is primarilyintended for use by clients prior to accessing, or attempting to access,a particular resource. The RC service may thus be used (for example) toinform a client as to which of a variety of features are supported bythe resource, or which methods may be used to access the resource, orwhich of a small set of locations may be used to access the resource.
